features: 🎤【Effective Noise Reduction】The karaoke microphone has a 3-layer anti-noise filter head, which can effectively reduce airflow and wind noise and dust interference generated when singing, without distortion and anti-howling! Built-in dual high-quality large speakers bring a 360-degree super surround feeling, allowing you to immerse yourself in the scene!

🎤【Advanced Audio Control】With volume and mix sliding buttons, it is inherently louder and more responsive. Shocking KTV live sound, clear music rhythm and echo reverberation. Premium microphone with dual stereo speakers for more comfort. It also has a built-in high-quality Bluetooth module, which can be used as a wireless speaker, MP3 player, recorder, and is compatible with various singing applications.

🎤【Multiple Fun】The karaoke machine adopts a perfect wireless design, connect your smart device (iPhone, iPad, Android phone, tablet, PC, etc.) with the karaoke microphone via Bluetooth, practice and share your Favorite songs Songs from YouTube, Yokee Plano, Smule Karaoke and more

🎤【What You Get】Built-in long-lasting capacity rechargeable battery. A great birthday or holiday gift for kids, friends or family. Buy now and get: (1) Karaoke microphone; (2) Micro USB cable; (3) Instruction manual.
🎁【Perfect Gift】Microphone for Singing Wireless Bluetooth Karaoke Microphone | Suitable for all ages girls, kids, boys, teens and adults any other holiday gift。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun, and simple to use!
reviews.reviewText: This mic is a lot of fun! And a lot of value for the money. It has built-in speaker that is pointed away from the singer so it doesn't feed back into the mic. It works very well! Don't expect it to be a professional piece of equipment but it will definitely bring a big smile to your face and everyone around you! It pairs quickly and easily to your phone and you can always find karaoke versions of songs and sing along with them. You could say this is a toy for kids, but it's fun for adults too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun microphone for the kids!
reviews.reviewText: I love the microphone. The colors change and can connect directly to your phone via Bluetooth. The kids loved it. Fun for the party. Audio level is perfect. Great gift ideas for Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It looks really pretty and works well. I didn't figure out all the buttons and all the functions before giving it to the children, but I figured out how to do the different voice changes which were enjoyable for me and for the children. And also it's easy to attach it to the Bluetooth and play music through it. I think it's a great toy and children love it. I will say, I could see how it could become annoying to the parents hahaha. But I am not the parents of the children I gave these to (my nieces and another family I am close with), so yeah sorry about that to them haha. But the kids love it and the parents could just get earplugs or send the kids outside to sing for the neighborhood.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My kids LOVE this microphone
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I’ll start by saying.. this microphone (blue tooth speaker) is awesome. You can easily connect it to the Bluetooth on your phone and it plays music just like a speaker would … but the best part is you can sing along with it just like it’s a microphone. You can also use it without music. There are several different “voices” it can switch to as well which are SO funny.My kids (age 6 and 5), as well as my husband and I absolutely love playing with it. It’s my children’s favorite toy right now. I have attached a video of how pretty the color changing lights are. It is such high quality. I would definitely recommend this toy. My only suggestion is… buy one for each of your children!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Endless Fun with LEETTUS Karaoke Microphone!
reviews.reviewText: This is an absolute hit in our household! It's become the go-to toy for endless hours of entertainment.The wireless feature gives the little ones the freedom to perform and dance around without any restrictions. The voice changer function adds an extra layer of fun, keeping them entertained and giggling for hours on end.I was pleasantly surprised by the sound quality - it's clear and crisp, which really adds to the overall experience. The portable design makes it easy for kids to carry around, whether they're performing in the living room, backyard, or even on a playdate.Additionally, this makes a fantastic gift for birthdays, Christmas, or any special occasion. It's versatile and sure to bring a smile to any child's face.Overall, the LEETTUS Karaoke Kids Microphone has been a game-changer in our house. It encourages creativity, boosts confidence, and provides hours of wholesome entertainment. I wholeheartedly recommend it to parents looking for a fantastic gift that will keep their kids engaged and happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, lights up and connects easily to cellphone via Bluetooth. Can change volume and voice sound have multiple options. Charging cord and instruction manual included. Good for karaoke & game night!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great gift for young singers or just speech amplification.
reviews.reviewText: Giving as a gift but of course had to try it out. Cool gift for kids but also amplifies enough for just talking in a crowded room without a formal podium/mic. I used it on Thanksgiving for "Hey everybody, dinner's ready!" Impromptu karaoke, practice singalong. It's fun and simple to use with or without the effects, which the kids will love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Kids Bluetooth Microphone
reviews.reviewText: Really cute kids bluetooth microphone! Connects with ease to devices. My 10 year old daughter loves it!
